Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.control.AbstractControl
      • model.GameObject
        • model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.scene.control.Control, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Player
extends GameObject
    This is the Player class of this game This class is for object player (character of this game)
